story_28_01000/2401_1101_0100_20:
The day of the semifinals had finally arrived, and
with it came the highly anticipated match between
[Name:PlayerNickname ]’s and Lear’s teams.
story_28_01000/2401_1101_0200_20:
Folks gathered around video screens all over
Pasio, eager to watch the live feed of the battle.
story_28_01000/2401_1001_0300_10:
We’re finally entering the final stretch of the PML!
Can you believe it?
story_28_01000/2401_1001_0400_10:
The only matches left now are the semifinals and
the finals.
story_28_01000/2401_1001_0500_10:
Who do you think is gonna move on today?
[Name:PlayerNickname ]’s team has had a
steady performance thus far.
story_28_01000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Or do you think it’ll be Lear’s team? I mean, he’s
practically announcing his victory already.
story_28_01000/2401_1001_0700_10: It could really go either way, huh.
story_28_01000/2401_1001_0800_10:
I should think not! Lear’s team is almost certainly
going to win. According to my latest data—
story_28_01000/2401_1001_1000_10:
I don’t care how strong his team is. I don’t wanna
see his pompous face in the finals! No way!
story_28_01000/2401_1001_1100_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]’s gonna win this one
for sure! Hundred percent!
story_28_01000/2401_1001_1200_10:
Now that you mention it, Lear becoming Champion
would be kinda...well...
story_28_01000/2401_1001_1300_10: You all know what I mean, right?
story_28_01000/2401_1001_1400_10:
All right! Come on, everyone! Let’s all root for
[Name:PlayerNickname ]’s team together!
story_28_01000/2401_1001_1700_10: Ooh! Look, the match is about to start!
